pullrequest.title: Helper classes for computing Signal Statistics

content.raw:
In general looks good to me. We could play a bit by using templates to define the data type on SignalStatistic instead of just suppose that double is enough as input and output. Maybe some fancy things will come in the future and overloading operators should leave us enough space to play.

just thinking, but it is ok as it is now.
